reviewText: This is a very good film.  I have used it from Prime in the past for my classroom studies on the 1920s.  I'm very disappointed it is no longer available.
Just saw at a NYC downtown film festival last night - it was great.  High quality production, interesting information and video clips.  Highly recommend.

This DVD is great for flapper fans, such as myself, or anyone who is interested in 1920's culture and history. Here is another product that I purchased which might be of interest to you: Betty Boop Red Dress Flapper Hi Figure Barbie Doll 10"

They say history repeats itself.  After watching the flappers video I tend to agree. We went from the era of over indulgence to depression in the twenties.  And we have pretty much done the same thing today.  Instead with the monetary controls in place we were able to stop the slide into a depression. Women are now leading the numbers in the work force and the media has taken control.
Thats why I like looking back in time because you see what is ahead of you.
